additional_comments: some variables with unclear coding; some variables morning-only

features.name: cigs
features.coding: Number of cigarettes smoked since the previous survey

features.name: angry
features.coding:
I feel angry
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: hungry
features.coding:
I feel hungry
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: restless
features.coding:
I feel restless
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: down
features.coding:
I feel down or depressed
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: bored
features.coding:
I feel bored
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: stressed
features.coding:
I feel stressed
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: motivated
features.coding:
I am motivated to quit smoking
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: want_quit
features.coding:
I want to quit smoking
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: impulsive
features.coding:
I feel impulsive
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: sleep_difficulty
features.coding:
unclear, but likely: Difficulty falling or staying asleep (morning only)
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: sleep_hours
features.coding: unclear, but likely: How many hours did you sleep last night? (morning only)

features.name: craving
features.coding:
How strong is your urge/craving to smoke right now?
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: enjoy_last
features.coding:
I enjoyed my last cigarette
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: trigger
features.coding:
People or situations are triggering me to smoke
0 = not at all
100 =  as much as possible

features.coding:
I feel irritable
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.coding:
unclear, but likely: I am having difficulty concentrating

100 = as much as possible

I feel calm

100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible

features.coding:

100 = as much as possible

features.name: hurt_health
features.coding:
My smoking is hurting my health
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: pos_expect
features.coding:
A cigarette would improve my mood or make me feel 
better
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: ashamed
features.coding:
I am embarassed/ashamed that I am a smoker
0 = not at all 
100 = as much as possible

features.name: agency
features.coding:
Unclear, but likely: The amount I smoke is within my own control
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: could_quit
features.coding:
If I tried to quit smoking right now I would be successful
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: delay_gratification
features.coding:
I can delay gratification
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: health_belief
features.coding:
My smoking is hurting my health
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible

features.coding: How many cigarettes do you think you’ll smoke today (morning only)
